data.title: Arvin and Stockdale High School: ESSER Portable Grading & Site Work
meta_keywords: Arvin and Stockdale High School: ESSER Portable Grading & Site Work
data.meta_description: CONSTRUCTION JOURNAL Project Report - Win more business with commercial construction leads. Powerful data, tools and analytics to help you stay ahead of your competitors.
data.text:
Description

Arvin: Provide labor, materials and equipment to clear, strip, and grub existing surface, import fill to prepare for new portable buildings per plans and specifications. Including but not limited to placing all-weather fire access, asphalt walks and landings, blackout parking spaces etc. Import to be taken from approved district stockpile at Del Oro HS, all spoils to be disposed of by contractor, district to provide surveying and testing. Stockdale: Provide labor, materials and equipment to clear, strip and grub existing surface to prepare for new portable buildings per plans and specifications. Including but not limited to removal of basketball hoops and volleyball poles, sawcut and removal of existing asphalt and concrete, placing new asphalt and concrete to new grades. All spoils to be disposed of by contractor, district to provide surveying. Other Details Notes Federal funds are being used either in whole or in part for this project (see the Instructions to Bidders), therefore this project is subject to, and CONTRACTOR must comply with, all applicable Federal laws including but not limited to the Federal Regulations set forth in CFR Title 2, Part 200. Accordingly, CONTRACTOR agrees to comply with all such Federal requirements. Liquidated Damages $1,000.00 Per Calendar Day Estimated Bid Value $310,000.00 Start/Delivery Date June 19, 2023 Project Duration 21 Calendar Days
